form.tourNamePlaceholder: huru ai, Tere māta'i tohora i te mata'i
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Fa'ahōho'a i tō tere. Te aha te mea rahi? Te aha tā te mau tā'ata e 'ite ai, e hana ai hō'ī?

form.tourTypeHelper: Tīpara'a i te huru tere māita'i roa nō tō tere

tooltips.tourName: Hāna'a ia māmā! 'O ia te mea rahi!
tooltips.duration: Fa'aora hō'ī i te taime fa'aea'e. Tere 'āfata mahana: 3-4h, Mahana atoa: 6-8h
tooltips.pricing: Fa'atū i tō moira'a. Te mau moira'a hope ia '00' anake (huru ai, 5600, 7200, 8500)
tooltips.meetingPoint: I'a pū! Fa'aora i te mau vāhi 'ite maitai. Huru ai: 'Vaiare Ferry Terminal - Te 'ōpū mata'i'

optionalSections.title: Mau tūtūra'a hāpō

optionalSections.complianceDesc: Taera'a taime, ture, mau fa'amanaora'a rahi

header.missingRequiredFields: Mau 'āmui ti'a roa e ma'e nei: {{fields}}
header.addOptionalDetails: Fa'aora i te mau fa'ahōho'ara'a fare tū'aro hāpō no te 100%

badges.requiredFieldsMissing: Mau 'āmui ti'a roa e ma'e nei

businessInfo.companyNameTooltip: Teie te huru tā te mau tā'ata tere e 'ite ai i tō fare tū'aro
businessInfo.companyNamePlaceholder: Fa'a'ite mai i te i'oa o tō fare tū'aro
businessInfo.contactPersonTooltip: Tā'ata fa'a'ite mata'i nō te mau fa'ari'ira'a
businessInfo.emailTooltip: Fa'a'ite i te 'ā'ō VAI no te taui email
businessInfo.emailChangeTooltip: Te taui email e ti'a ai te fa'a'ite 'ā'ō VAI
businessInfo.phoneTooltip: Fa'aora i te nūmera fenua (huru ai, +689 nō Pōrīnetia Farāni)
businessInfo.whatsappTooltip: Fa'aaara nō te mau fa'ailoara'a fa'ari'ira'a vave e te parau kirimita
businessInfo.islandTooltip: Motu mata'i e hana nei 'oe i te mau tere
businessInfo.addressTooltip: Vāhi rā'au o tō fare tū'aro
businessInfo.addressPlaceholder: Fa'a'ite mai i te fa'ari'ira'a fare tū'aro pe te vāhi tūtaki mata'i

credentials.missingCredentialsText: Fa'a'ite i te 'ā'ō VAI no te fa'aara'a tiketī fare tū'aro, palapala haumaru moni, pe te taotoga mata'u māta'i tohora.

billing.paymentInfoText: Te mau fa'aafaro e ravehia i te āva'e ta'ato'a. Fa'a'ite i te 'ā'ō VAI no te fa'atū fa'aafaro e te faturera'a.

healthDescriptions.excellent: Tō fare tū'aro e tiapura nei! 'Aita te taui!
healthDescriptions.good: Ne'ine'ira'a maitai. Te mau fa'ahouara'a 'ī e nehenehe ai te fa'arahi i tō mālo'o.
healthDescriptions.needsImprovement: Fa'anahote'a i te taime 'ā'amu e te profil oti no te fa'arahi i tō tupura'a.

validation.companyNameRequired: I'oa fare tū'aro e ti'a roa

messages.profileNotFound: Profil 'ore i 'ite hia. Fa'a'ite mai i te 'ā'ō.
messages.conflictingInfo: Teie fa'ahōho'ara'a e pa'ari nei e te ta'oto'a rē. Māta'i i tō mau 'ite.
messages.noPermission: 'Aita tō 'ā'au no te fa'ahou i teie profil. Fa'a'ite i te 'ā'ō.
messages.updateError: 'Aore e nehenehe te fa'aora i te mau taui. 'A fa'aauau pe fa'a'ite i te 'ā'ō ina mau ai te piha'e.
messages.securityPolicyError: Fa'ahou pa'ari: Te ture haumaru database ua fa'a'ore i te fa'ahouara'a. Fa'a'ite mai i te 'ā'ō i hello@vai.studio no te fa'atū i tō mau 'ā'au.
